MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the WA5 postcode area of Penketh, affecting properties in Farnworth Road, Greenall Avenue and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm following damage to the network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:15pm on 30th December 2020.
